name: Thermal Imaging Camera (AICTE funded project under RPS)
spec: Laser distance meter: Yes, calculates distance to the target for precisely focused images and displays distance on screen
Touchscreen display (capacitive): 14.4 cm (5.7 in) diagonal landscape color VGA (640 x 480) LCD with backlight
Fluke Connect™ app compatible: Yes (where available)
Built-in digital camera (visible light): 5 megapixel industrial performance
Software: SmartView® software, Fluke Connect™ (where available), and SmartView® Mobile App - full analysis and reporting software
Temperature measurement range (not calibrated below -10 °C): -20 °C to +1200 °C (-4 °F to +2192 °F)
Accuracy: ± 2 °C or 2 % (at 25 °C nominal, whichever is greater)
use_cases: To detect radiation with easy maneuver over, under, and around objects with the 240° rotating screen and still view at a comfortable angle.
Condition monitoring of electrical and mechanical systems, such as with the location of thermal leaks or the higher temperatures in overheated regions.
To record the thermal profile of mold surface during solidification in metal casting.

use_cases: Use Cases

name: DCRF Magnetron Sputtering
spec: Target Material: 50 mm Diameter × 6.5 mm Thick
use_cases: Magnetron sputtering is a widely used physical vapor deposition (PVD) technique for developing thin films and coatings. It is popular in both research and industry because it offers excellent control over film thickness, uniformity, and composition.

name: Automatic Goniometer
use_cases: An automated goniometer is a precision instrument used to measure the contact angle between a surface and a liquid droplet. It measures the wettability properties of the surface.

name: Ultrasonic Probe Sonicator
use_cases: An Ultrasonic Probe Sonicator is a lab device that uses high-frequency sound waves transmitted through a probe (horn) to create intense ultrasonic energy in liquids. This energy generates microscopic bubbles that collapse violently—a process called acoustic cavitation—which breaks particles apart, mixes substances, and promotes chemical reactions.

name: Auto CAST
use_cases: AutoCAST is a specialized casting simulation software used to design, simulate, and optimize metal casting processes. It helps researchers and foundry engineers predict and prevent casting defects before the physical casting is made.

name: COMSOL
use_cases: COMSOL Multiphysics is a powerful simulation software used for modeling and solving real-world engineering and physics-based problems. Its strength lies in multiphysics coupling—allowing simulation of multiple physical phenomena that interact with each other in one environment.

name: CNC Vertical Machining Center
spec: 3-Axis Vertical Machining Centre with SINUMERIK 802 D SL Controller
Table Size: 600x300 mm; Max Load on Table: 200Kg
X-axis Travel: 400 mm, Y-axis Travel: 300 mm, Z-axis Travel: 400 mm
Dist. From Spindle face to table top: 200–550 mm
Spindle Speed: 0–10000 rpm; Front Bearing Bore: 9.27/7 Kw: BT40 Taper
Rapid Traverse (XYZ): 40 m/min; Cutting Feed: 10 m/min
No. of Tools: 12; Max. Tool Dia: 80 mm; Tool Wt.: 7 Kg; Tool Length: 200 mm
Spindle Drive: AC; Axis Drive: AC Servo
use_cases: The CNC Vertical Machining Center (VMC) is used for a wide range of milling, drilling, tapping, and boring operations.

name: Joemars Electrical Discharge Machining setup
spec: A.Z 50 R +D 320 with Automatic fire extinguisher
use_cases: The Joemars Electrical Discharge Machining (EDM) setup is used for precision machining of hard-to-machine materials, especially super alloys such as titanium, Inconel, carbides, hardened steel, and tool steels.

name: Kistler 9272 Piezoelectric Dynamometer
spec: The natural frequency of the dynamometer is about 3 kHz
Measuring range: Fx, Fy = ±5 KN, Fz = -5 to 20 KN, Mz = ±200 N.m
use_cases: The Kistler 9272 is a piezoelectric dynamometer, specifically used for measuring cutting forces in milling, drilling, and turning operations. It is widely used in machining research.

name: Data Logging System from National Instruments equipped with LabVIEW software
Universal Testing Machine
spec: Force Measurement: Load Cell Capacity- 50 KN & 50 N
use_cases: The universal testing machine provides testing facilities like tensile testing, compression testing, and flexural testing for metals, non-metals, and composites. It also provides the tensile testing facility for natural and synthetic fibers. It has an inbuilt software facility to plot the graphs for various experimental results.

name: 3D Printer
spec: Printing Materials: PLA, PETG, ABS, TPU, NYLON
use_cases: This printer is used to make 3D prototypes or parts for various applications or student projects.

name: Wear & Friction Monitor
spec: Wear Disc Diameter: 165 mm, Thickness: 8 mm, Material: En 31 hardened to 60HRc ground to 1.6Ra surface roughness
Disc Speed: Min: 200 rpm; Max: 2000 rpm
Frictional force: Max 200 N; resolution of 1N
use_cases: Wear and friction setup measures wear and friction for metals, non-metals, and composites. It has an inbuilt software facility to plot the graphs for various experimental results.

name: Surface Texture Machine
spec: Measuring Range: X Axis-100mm, Z Axis-800 µm/0.01 µm
Measuring Method: X-axis-Linear scale, Z axis-Differential Indu.
use_cases: The Surftest SV-2100 is a high-precision and high-performance surface roughness tester with a dedicated control unit, achieving user-friendly display and simple operation. The Surftest SV-2100 surface tester provides highly accurate analysis of surface roughness and fine contours.

name: 3D Microscope
spec: Image Detecting unit: 1/2-inch colour CMOS camera 3 mega-pixels
use_cases: Vision measuring machine 'Quick Scope' (3D Microscope; MITUTOYO/ QS-L2010ZB) for surface observation and to measure dimensions.

name: 3D Laser Scanner
spec: Minimum scanning Area: Plane and rotary scanning, width: 200 mm, Height: 300mm
Minimum scanning Pitch: Plane scanning: Width direction 0.2 to 300 mm, Height direction 0.2 to 300 mm; Rotary scanning: Circumference 0.2 to 3.6 degrees, Height direction 0.2 to 300 mm
Minimum operating speed: Table rotation speed: 10 rpm; Head rotation speed: 4.5rpm; Maximum head movement speed: 50 mm/sec
use_cases: The LPX-60 is ideal for reverse engineering and for designing smaller items for the production of clay prototypes. This can generate CAD models from existing parts or partial models.

name: KD2 Prob Thermal Analyser
spec: Operating Environment: Controller: 0 to 50°C; Sensors: -50 to +150°C
Battery Life: At least 500 readings in constant use or 3 years with no use (battery drain in sleep mode < 50 uA)
Case Size: 15.5 cm x 9.5 cm x 3.5 cm
Display: 3 cm x 6 cm, 128 x 64-pixel graphics LCD
Data Storage: 4095 measurements in flash memory (both raw and processed data are stored for download)
Read Modes: Manual and Auto Read
use_cases: To measure the thermal properties of liquid, semisolid, and solid materials.

name: Universal Testing Machine
spec: Tensile test range: 10 mm dia to 25 mm dia
Operation: Computerised with software and manual
use_cases: Measures the material's resistance to pulling forces, determining properties like tensile strength and elongation.
Assesses the material's behavior under crushing loads, identifying compressive strength.

name: Fatigue Testing Machine
spec: Complete with AC drive for speed control
Software for S and N Curve
Online graphic display on computer screen
use_cases: To simulate cyclic loading conditions to determine how materials behave under repeated stress over time.

name: Torsion Testing Machine
use_cases: Measures the material's response to torque, determining properties like shear modulus and torsional strength.

name: Gas Chromatograph
use_cases: Chromatography used in analytical for separating and analyzing compounds that can be vaporized without decomposition
To separate and measure organic molecules and gases
Typical uses of GC include testing the purity of a particular substance or separating the different components of a mixture.

name: UV Visible Spectrophotometer (CARY 60)
spec: Measure small volumes and precious samples accurately and reproducibly with a highly focused beam image
Scan the entire wavelength range (190 to 1100 nm) in under three seconds and collect data from single or multiple wavelengths at 80 data points per second
use_cases: UV-Vis Spectroscopy (or Spectrophotometry) is a quantitative technique used to measure how much a chemical substance absorbs light.
UV-Vis spectrophotometers provide fast and efficient analysis, allowing researchers to obtain results within a few seconds.
Water and wastewater analysis

name: Bending Moments in a Portal Frame - STR 20
Servo Shake Table
spec: Sliding table dimension: 500 mm x 500 mm
use_cases: To test the dynamic response of buildings, bridges, and other structures to assess their seismic performance and improve design standards
Specific components like dampers, bearings, and isolators can be tested to ensure they perform effectively during earthquakes
To study the interaction between soil and structures, crucial for designing foundations and earth-retaining structures
To simulate ground shaking to study soil liquefaction, a phenomenon where saturated soil loses strength during earthquakes.

name: dSPACE
spec: MicroLabBox – a high-performance development system at a compact single-box form factor that combines a powerful dual-core real-time processor with a user-programmable FPGA
The MicroLabBox provides over 100 commonly used I/O channels for many kinds of function development, test and data acquisition tasks
Its integrated connector panel allows easy I/O access
dSPACE hardware seamlessly integrates with dSPACE software and with MATLAB®/Simulink®/State flow® from Math works to form a highly efficient tool chain
DS1104 – a cost-effective entry system with I/O interfaces and a real-time processor on a single board that can be plugged directly into a PC
The system is ideal for developing smaller control applications and for educational purposes.
use_cases: Robotics
Active noise and vibration control
Medical engineering
Electric drives
Renewable energy
Industrial and domestic devices that require electronic controllers
Further control applications in academic research and education

name: Earth Tester
use_cases: Hazards due to improper earth / ground happen around us every day.
Every electrical equipment, appliance or network must be properly earthed to allow a low resistance path for dissipation of leakage current into the earth.

Clamp-On Earth / Ground Resistance Tester can measure accurately within a few minutes the ground resistance & AC current (load & leakage) of all types of installations by just clamping to the grounding lines without disconnecting the circuit or driving auxiliary electrodes.

name: Mixed Signal Oscilloscope (MSO)
spec: Sample rates up to 1 GS/s on all channels
1 Mega sample record length on all channels
use_cases: Embedded design and debug
Mixed signal design and debug
Power measurements
Automotive electronics
Education and Training
Video design and debug

name: POWER QUALITY ANALYZER
spec: Single-phase 2-wire, Single-phase 3-wire, Three-phase 3-wire or Three-phase 4-wire plus one extra input channel for voltage, current, power measurement (AC or DC measurement)
Voltage measurement: 600.00 V rms .Transient measurement 6.0000 kV peak
Voltage: ±0.1% of nominal voltage Current: ±0.1 % rdg. ±0.1 % f.s. + current sensor accuracy Active power: ±0.2 % rdg. ±0.1 % f.s. + current sensor accuracy
use_cases: Management of Measurement Data for UPS Sites to Facilitate the Digital Transformation
Measure Transient Voltage Waveforms
Measure Voltage Drop Caused by Wiring Impedance
Measure the Noise Generated by Switching Power Factor Correction Capacitors
Measure the High-Order Harmonic Voltage and Current of Power Lines

name: Product Design Lab:

Eleven Lab PCB Prototyping Machine for precise PCB fabrication
Cable and Antenna Analyzer/Vector Network Analyzer with a frequency range of 2 MHz to 6 GHz for comprehensive testing and analysis
Anechoic Test Boxes integrated with an antenna positioner controller for accurate and reliable testing in a controlled environment.
use_cases: The Product Design Lab offers diverse functionalities, including cable and antenna testing for return and cable loss measurements using vector network analysis with Smith chart displays
It supports antenna testing, pattern measurement
low-noise testing of microwave devices
the fabrication of electronic PCBs, antennas, and absorbers, serving various engineering and research needs.

name: Tinkering & Innovation Lab:
spec: The Tinkering & Innovation Lab is well equipped and organised with real time application oriented hardware tools to design hardware of minor or major projects
design analysis and project based development are done in this lab.

name: Simulation Lab:
spec: Simulation Lab is well equipped with all the latest and high end software to do the research in the field of Simulation of Circuit Design
Simulation of Embedded Design based applications.
use_cases: The licensed software gives all the latest technology simulation environment support in the field of Embedded System Design, Radio Frequency Circuit Design, Simulation of Sensor network design
The Laboratory is engaged in research on architecture, design, and tools for networked and embedded computing and communication systems.

name: VLSI & Embedded Lab I/II:
spec: VLSI and Embedded Lab I and II are well equipped with all the latest and high end software to do the research in the field of VLSI Design and Verification
use_cases: The licensed softwares like MATLAB, Asnys HFSS, Atmel Studio, Xilinx Vivado give all the latest technology simulation environment support innovation in the field of VLSI Design and Verification, Digital Signal Processing and its Applications, Embedded Systems, Wireless Communication, Programming Languages, Cloud Computing, Image and Video Processing
The laboratory focuses on advancing research in architecture, design, and tools for VLSI and Embedded Systems which are at the core of modern technological innovation

The laboratory’s work extends to practical applications, such as enabling smart cities, improving healthcare systems, and advancing autonomous systems, making it a hub for innovation that addresses real-world challenges through interdisciplinary collaboration and cutting-edge technologies.
